original_title: Exam. Dept. to recruit graduates for govt. service after examinations
original_body_lines: The Examination Department has planned to conduct examinations to recruit graduates for Government Service as teachers, the Education Ministry said.
An Education Ministry official said the examination would be conducted in 341 examination centers across the country on March 25.
The Examination Department has made the necessary arrangements to send the admission cards to the candidates for this test.

Based on the results of this test, the number of graduates required to fill vacant teaching positions in National and Provincial Schools will be calculated. Recruitments will be made based on those vacancies.
For the vacancies that arise after that, the Provincial Councils will recruit graduates on a provincial basis. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
